tactile_feedback.description: Feedback on the amount of force applied to secure the object.
examples: Feeling a firm grip on a glass
Adjusting pressure to hold a soft cushion without squeezing

tactile_feedback.description: Detecting the surface texture of the object to adjust grip strategy.
examples: Smooth surface of a ceramic plate
Rough texture of a cardboard box

tactile_feedback.description: Sensing the object's weight to adjust handling approach.
examples: Lifting a heavy book with two hands
Picking up a light toy with one hand

tactile_feedback.description: Sensing if the object is balanced or slipping during pickup.
examples: Detecting a plate sliding in hand
Feeling a ball roll slightly when grabbed

tactile_feedback.description: Feeling the initial contact between hand or tool and the object.
examples: Touching the edge of a book
Fingers making contact with a mug handle

tactile_feedback.description: Detecting any movement of the object during or after pickup.
examples: Feeling a toy shift in grip
Sensing a bottle tip while being lifted

tactile_feedback.description: Sensing the object's flexibility to prevent damage or deformation.
examples: Compressing a soft pillow slightly
Holding a flexible plastic container

tactile_feedback.description: Sensing resistance or force through tools used for pickup.
examples: Feeling resistance in tongs while gripping a small object
Detecting force through a robotic gripper

tactile_feedback.description: Feeling the friction between the object and surface during lifting.
examples: Sliding a book off a polished table
Lifting a sticky jar from a countertop

tactile_feedback.description: Detecting the object's temperature to adjust handling approach.
examples: Feeling a warm mug of coffee
Touching a cold metal spoon
